mapper.select:
SELECT B.RNUM, B.STF_SQ, B.STF_PT_RT, B.STF_NM, B.RNK_NM, B.DPT_NM, B.ADMN_PW, B.STF_PH, B.STF_BS_PH1, B.STF_BS_PH2, B.STF_BS_PH3, B.STF_EML FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.STF_SQ, A.STF_PT_RT, A.STF_NM, A.RNK_NM, A.DPT_NM, A.ADMN_PW, A.STF_PH, A.STF_BS_PH1, A.STF_BS_PH2, A.STF_BS_PH3, A.STF_EML FROM ( SELECT STF.STF_SQ, STF.STF_PT_RT, STF.STF_NM, RNK.RNK_SQ, RNK.RNK_NM, DD.DPT_NM, ADMN.ADMN_PW, STF.STF_PH, STF.STF_BS_PH1, STF.STF_BS_PH2, STF.STF_BS_PH3, STF.STF_EML FROM STF_TB STF, ADMN_TB ADMN, RNK_TB RNK, DPT_DIV_TB DD WHERE ADMN.ADMNN_SQ = STF.ADMN_SQ AND RNK.RNK_SQ = STF.RNK_SQ AND DD.DPT_SQ = STF.DPT_SQ2
AND STF.STF_NM LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
AND RNK.RNK_NM LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
AND DD.DPT_NM LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY DPT_NM DESC, RNK_SQ ASC, STF_NM ASC
)A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endCount} )B WHERE B.RNUM >= #{startCount} ORDER BY RNUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM STF_TB STF, ADMN_TB ADMN, RNK_TB RNK, DPT_DIV_TB DD WHERE ADMN.ADMNN_SQ = STF.ADMN_SQ AND RNK.RNK_SQ = STF.RNK_SQ AND DD.DPT_SQ = STF.DPT_SQ2
SELECT STF.STF_NM, RNK.RNK_NM, DD.DPT_NM FROM STF_TB STF, ADMN_TB ADMN, RNK_TB RNK, DPT_DIV_TB DD WHERE ADMN.ADMNN_SQ = STF.ADMN_SQ AND RNK.RNK_SQ = STF.RNK_SQ AND DD.DPT_SQ = STF.DPT_SQ2
SELECT ADMNN_SQ, ADMN_PW FROM ADMN_TB ORDER BY ADMNN_SQ
SELECT RNK_SQ, RNK_NM FROM RNK_TB ORDER BY RNK_SQ
SELECT DPT_SQ, DPT_NM FROM DPT_DIV_TB ORDER BY DPT_SQ
